content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Operation at (-15, -15)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (24.0, -15.0)
- Storage chest at (23.5, -16.5)
Currently mining coal with 341 coal stored in chest

### Iron Ore Mining Operation at (-14, 23)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-14.0, 23.0)
- Storage chest at (-14.5, 21.5)
Currently mining iron ore with 299 iron ore stored in chest

### Copper Ore Mining Operation at (20, 20)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (20.0, 20.0)
- Storage chest at (20.5, 21.5)
Currently mining copper ore with 345 copper ore stored

### Iron Smelting Area at (-10, 20)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (-11.0, 20.0) and (-9.0, 20.0)
Currently inactive due to no ingredients

### Copper Plate Production System at (24, 20)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at (24.0, 20.0)
- Input chest at (22.5, 21.5) containing 377 copper ore
- Output chest at (24.5, 17.5) containing 53 copper plates
- Input inserter at (22.5, 20.5) moving ore from input chest to furnace
- Output inserter at (24.5, 18.5) moving plates from furnace to output chest

ERROR TIPS

### Furnace Fuel Management Issues
- Ensure you have coal in your inventory before attempting to insert fuel into furnaces
- Check fuel levels of furnaces regularly to maintain continuous operation

### Furnace Operation Issues
- Multiple furnaces showing "no ingredients to smelt" warnings
- Ensure proper configuration of input inserters to feed materials into furnaces
- Verify inserter pickup and drop positions align with input/output requirements

### Resource Management
- Monitor fuel levels in burner mining drills to maintain continuous operation
- Ensure proper connection between mining drills and storage chests
- Verify inserter configurations for efficient material transfer between storage and processing
